paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses a case of a patient with Lynch syndrome and mentions an intronic variant in the BRCA2 gene classified as a variant of uncertain significance (VUS).

individual_records.evidence_sentence: the patient was treated with pembrolizumab and she did not benefit from this kind of treatment.

functional_data.summary: The variant is classified as a variant of uncertain significance.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is intronic and classified as VUS, indicating uncertain clinical significance.
key_quotes: an intronic variant in the BRCA2 gene [intron 9, c.793+46_793+48del, p.(?)] classified as variants of uncertain significance

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in BRCA2 was reported in the paper.
